sourcesContent:
{{ nsmanInfo.nric }} {{ nsmanInfo.fullName }}
Upd. On Event Details Effective Date Event Type Event Type {{ record.updatedDt | date:'dd-MM-yyyy' }} {{ record.eventDetails }} {{ record.effectiveDate }} {{ record.eventType }} No records found. import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { LazyLoadEvent } from 'primeng/api'; import { Ns2HttpService } from 'app/shared/service/ns2-http.service'; import { CustomToastService } from 'app/layouts/service/customtoast.service'; import { DateUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/date-utils.service'; import { ExportUtilsService } from 'app/core/util/export-utils.service'; import { EnquiryNSmanService } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/service/enquiry-nsman.service'; import { Table } from 'primeng/table'; import { NSmanPersonalInfo } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/nsman.model'; import { PayrollEvent } from 'app/enquiry/nsman/model/payroll-related.model'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-nsman-payroll-event-table', templateUrl: './nsman-payroll-event-table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nsman-payroll-event-table.component.scss'] }) export class NsmanPayrollEventTableComponent implements OnInit { @Input() rankOnly: boolean; @Input() nsmanInfo: NSmanPersonalInfo; sampleData = [{ sample : "sample" }]; // LazyLoad variables lazyLoadEvent: LazyLoadEvent; totalRecords?: number; loading?: boolean; eventList: PayrollEvent[] = []; constructor( private ns2HttpService: Ns2HttpService, private toastService: CustomToastService, private dateUtilsService: DateUtilsService, private exportUtilsService: ExportUtilsService, private enquiryNSmanService: EnquiryNSmanService, ) {} ngOnInit(): void { // } load(event: LazyLoadEvent): void { setTimeout(() => { this.loading = true; this.lazyLoadEvent = event; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(event, null, null); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); if (this.rankOnly) { options.params = options.params.append("eventType", "Rank"); } this.enquiryNSmanService.getPayrollEventTable(options).subscribe(resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { this.eventList = resp.body.data.content; this.totalRecords = resp.body.data.totalElements; } else { this.eventList = []; this.totalRecords = 0; } this.loading = false; }); }, 0); } exportCSV(dataTable: Table): void { let csvTitle = "Enquiry Payroll Event Table"; const options = this.ns2HttpService.convertLazyEvent(this.lazyLoadEvent, 0, this.totalRecords); options.params = options.params.append("nric", this.nsmanInfo.nric); if (this.rankOnly) { options.params = options.params.append("eventType", "Rank"); csvTitle = "Enquiry Payroll Rank Event"; } this.enquiryNSmanService.getPayrollEventTable(options).subscribe( resp => { if (resp.body?.data?.content) { const data = resp.body?.data?.content; const columns = [ { field: 'sn', header: 'SN', index: 0 }, { field: 'updatedDt', header: 'Updated On', index: 1 }, { field: 'eventDetails', header: 'Event Details', index: 2 }, { field: 'effectiveDate', header: 'Effective Date', index: 3 }, { field: 'eventType', header: 'Event Type', index: 4 }, ]; const dtoList: any[] = []; console.log("data", data); data.forEach((record: PayrollEvent, index: number) => { const dto = { sn: index + 1, updatedDt: `${String(this.dateUtilsService.formatStrDate(record.updatedDt, "DD-MM-YYYY"))}`, eventDetails: record.eventDetails, effectiveDate: record.effectiveDate, eventType: record.eventType, } dtoList.push(dto); }); this.exportUtilsService.exportCSV(dataTable, dtoList, resp.body.data.totalElements, columns, csvTitle); } }, error => { console.log(error.error?.error_desc); this.loading = false; }) } }
